text: Chris Dapolito is an American football coach and former player. He served as the head football coach at Pace University from 2010 to 2013, compiling a record of 1–38. Dapolito played college football at Duke University, where he was a starting quarterback during the 2003 and 2004 seasons. ==Head coaching record== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Duke Blue Devils football players Category:Pace Setters football coaches
title: Chris Dapolito
